title: Post-Game Emoji Reactions
description: Social feature where players can select an emoji for their opponent at the end of a 2-player game. Emojis are stored as a history string on each player's profile (last ~40), with the most popular emoji highlighted.

requirements.detail: Add emoji_reactions field to farkle_players table (VARCHAR, stores last ~40 emojis as string)
Add emoji_given field to farkle_games_players table to track if player already sent/skipped emoji for that game
Emoji picker popup (6x6 grid) auto-appears after 2-player game ends
Popup only shows for non-multiplayer games (2 players only)
Popup only shows within 1 day of game completion
Popup hidden if player already selected or skipped emoji for that game
Skip button closes popup and marks emoji_given so it won't appear again
Selecting emoji appends to opponent's emoji_reactions (prepend new, trim to ~40)
Player profile shows 'From Your Opponents:' emoji stream
Player profile shows 'You're known for:' with most common emoji + count
Curate 36 balanced emojis for the picker grid
Add emoji_sent field to farkle_games_players to store the actual emoji chosen (separate from emoji_given boolean)
Display the sent emoji in the game view, floating left of the opponent's player card
Replace player card image (stock.png) with emoji - in game view show emoji_sent, elsewhere show 'known for' emoji
Remove all stock.png and Facebook image logic from player cards

tasks.description: Add database schema for emoji reactions
Create PHP backend for emoji submission
Add emoji display to player profile
Add emoji_sent field to database schema and migration
Update PHP backend to store and return emoji_sent
Display emoji in game view next to opponent player card
Replace player card image with emoji display
Add known_for_emoji to player data queries for non-game contexts
Final verification - verify all requirements are satisfied
